meanings.definition: The quality or state of being remunerative; profitability.
meanings.sent1: The remunerativeness of the job attracted many applicants.
meanings.sent2: Her hard work was rewarded with the remunerativeness she deserved.
meanings.sent3: The clown's performance had a surprising remunerativeness, drawing a large crowd.
meanings.sent4: The remunerativeness of the investment exceeded all expectations.
meanings.sent5: The remunerativeness of the business venture was evident from the start.

meanings.definition: The ability to provide compensation or payment for work or services.
meanings.sent1: The company's remunerativeness ensured employee satisfaction.
meanings.sent2: His skills were matched by the remunerativeness of the position.
meanings.sent3: The remunerativeness of the fundraiser surprised everyone with its success.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness had a remunerativeness that extended beyond monetary value.
meanings.sent5: The remunerativeness of the scholarship program changed many lives for the better.
